text:
e="preserve">Jaybee Niño Manicad Sebastian (1979/1980 – July 18, 2020) was a Filipino criminal. He was at the New Bilibid Prison (NBP). He was convicted for kidnap-for-ransom and carjacking in 2009. He was known for running a prison and being involved in the illegal drug trade within the prison.
Sebastian died of COVID-19 at the New Bilibid Prison Hospital on July 18, 2020, aged 40.
